title: How are cell phones related to technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cellular technology is what mobile phone networks are based on, and it's the technology that gave mobile phones the name “cell phones”. The other main concept of cellular technology was that they were “multiple access”, meaning that they placed multiple voice or data connections into a single radio channel. Mobile technology is a form of technology that is mostly used in cellular communication and other related aspects. It uses a form of platform where by many transmitters have the ability to send data at the same time on a single channel. This platform is called Code-division multiple access (CDMA). There are three common technologies used by cell-phone networks for transmitting information: Frequency division multiple access (FDMA)Time division multiple access (TDMA)Code division multiple access (CDMA).
